summary.text:
A boolean value that indicates whether a particular device provides the [App Attest](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/devicecheck/establishing-your-app-s-integrity) service.
Not all device types support the App Attest service, so check for support before using the service.
Asks Apple to attest to the validity of a generated cryptographic key.

content.text: A Promise that is fulfilled with a string that contains the attestation data. A statement from Apple about the validity of the key associated with keyId. Send this to your server for processing.

summary.text: The identifier you received by calling the
`generateKey`
function.
A challenge string from your server.
Creates a block of data that demonstrates the legitimacy of an instance of your app running on a device.

content.text: A Promise that is fulfilled with a string that contains the assertion object. A data structure that you send to your server for processing.

summary.text: The identifier you received by calling the
`generateKey`
function.
A string to be signed with the attested private key.

Generates a hardware-attested key pair in the Android Keystore.
This key can be used for attestation on GrapheneOS and other secure Android distributions.

content.text: A Promise that resolves when the key is generated successfully.

summary.text: A unique identifier for the key.
A challenge string from your server.
Creates a new cryptographic key for use with the App Attest service.

content.text: A Promise that is fulfilled with a string that contains the key identifier. The key itself is stored securely in the Secure Enclave.

summary.text:
Retrieves the attestation certificate chain for a hardware-attested key.
The certificate chain can be validated on your server to verify device integrity.

content.text: A Promise that is fulfilled with an array of base64-encoded X.509 certificates.

summary.text: The identifier of the key to get certificates for.
Checks if hardware attestation is supported on this device.

content.text: A Promise that is fulfilled with a boolean indicating support.

summary.text: Prepares the integrity token provider for the given cloud project number.

content.text: A Promise that is fulfilled if the integrity token provider is prepared successfully.

summary.text: The cloud project number.
Requests an integrity verdict for the given request hash from Google Play.

content.text: A Promise that is fulfilled with a string that contains the integrity check result.

summary.text: A string representing the request hash.
